title: The Indira Gandhi National Tribal University Act, 2007
description: Establishes IGN Tribal University and regulates its administration and academic programs.

title: The Legislative Assembly of Nagaland (Change in Representation) Act, 1968
description: Amends the composition and representation in the Nagaland Legislative Assembly.

title: The Reserve Bank (Transfer to Public Ownership) Act, 1948
description: Transferred ownership of the Reserve Bank of India to the Government of India.

title: The Tribunals Reforms Act, 2021
description: Amends laws related to the structure and functioning of tribunals in India.

title: The Industrial Development Bank (Transfer of Undertaking and Repeal) Act, 2003
description: Transfers the undertaking of the Industrial Development Bank and repeals the original act.

title: The Prohibition of Child Marriage Act, 2006
description: Amends previous legislation to strengthen prohibition of child marriage.

title: The Prevention of Cruelty to Animals Act, 1960
description: Updates regulations and penalties for the prevention of cruelty to animals.

title: The Charitable Endowments Act, 1890
description: Amends provisions regulating management and control of charitable endowments.

title: The Anti-Apartheid (United Nations Convention) Act, 1981
description: Implements UN conventions against apartheid and related sanctions.

title: The Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019
description: Amends previous territorial laws for reorganisation into two Union Territories.

title: The African Development Fund Act, 1982
description: Updates India's participation and contributions to the African Development Fund.

title: The African Development Bank Act, 1983
description: Amends legislation regarding India's membership and investment in the African Development Bank.

title: The International Development Association (Status, Immunities and Privileges) Act, 1960
description: Grants immunities, privileges, and legal status to IDA operations in India.

title: The North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971
description: Amends previous laws for reorganisation of north-eastern states of India.

title: The Repealing and Amending Act, 2016
description: Repeals obsolete laws and amends existing statutes for legal clarity.

title: The Public Sector Iron and Steel Companies (Restructuring) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1978
description: Provides for restructuring and regulation of public sector iron and steel companies.

title: The Orphanages and other Charitable Homes (Supervision and Control) Act, 1960
description: Amends provisions for supervision and control of orphanages and charitable homes.

title: The Indian Forest Act, 1927
description: Amends forest law provisions relating to conservation, management, and use of forest resources.

title: The Apprentices Act, 1961
description: Updates provisions regarding training, employment, and regulation of apprentices.

title: The Revenue Recovery Act, 1890
description: Amends rules for recovery of public revenues and arrears from defaulters.

title: The Indian Veterinary Council Act, 1984
description: Updates regulations governing veterinary education, practice, and professional standards.

title: The Compensatory Afforestation Fund Act, 2016
description: Amends provisions for compensatory afforestation funds and their management.

title: The Delhi and Ajmer-Merwara Land Development Act, 1948
description: Updates land development regulations and authorities in Delhi and Ajmer-Merwara.

title: The State of Mizoram Act, 1986
description: Amends laws related to the formation and administration of Mizoram as a state.

title: The British India Corporation Limited (Acquisition of Shares) Act, 1981
description: Amends provisions regarding government acquisition of shares in the British India Corporation.

title: The Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960
description: Amends laws for reorganisation of Bombay state into Maharashtra and Gujarat.

title: The Anti-Hijacking Act, 2016
description: Updates penalties and procedures for aircraft hijacking offenses.

title: The National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development Act, 2021
description: Amends provisions regarding financing infrastructure projects in India.

title: The Maternity Benefit Act, 1961
description: Updates regulations for maternity benefits, leave, and employment protections for women.

title: The State of Arunachal Pradesh Act, 1986
description: Amends laws regarding the formation and administration of Arunachal Pradesh as a state.

title: The Regional Rural Banks Act, 1976
description: Updates provisions governing the establishment and operation of regional rural banks.

title: The Hotel-Receipts Tax Act, 1980
description: Amends provisions for taxation on receipts of hotels and hospitality establishments.

title: The Visva-Bharati Act, 1951
description: Updates governance and administration provisions of Visva-Bharati University.

title: The Central Sales Tax Act, 1956
description: Amends rules for levy, collection, and regulation of central sales tax.

title: The Patents Act, 1970
description: Updates provisions related to patent rights, filing, and enforcement.

title: The Andhra Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2014
description: Amends laws governing the bifurcation of Andhra Pradesh and formation of Telangana.

title: The Central Excise Act, 1944
description: Updates provisions for levy, collection, and regulation of central excise duties.

title: The Chemical Weapons Convention Act, 2000
description: Amends regulations to comply with international chemical weapons treaties and enforcement.

title: The Indira Gandhi National Tribal University Act, 2007
description: Updates governance and administration of Indira Gandhi National Tribal University.

title: The Dr. Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University Act, 2016
description: Amends rules for governance, administration, and academic functioning of the university.

title: The Geneva Conventions Act, 1960
description: Updates national enforcement provisions related to the Geneva Conventions on humanitarian law.

title: The Companies Act, 2013
description: Amends provisions related to corporate governance, company registration, and compliance.

title: The Income-tax Act, 1961
description: Updates rules for levy, collection, and regulation of income tax in India.

The Suppression of Unlawful Acts against Safety of Civil Aviation Act, 1982
description: Penalizes acts endangering safety of aircraft or airports; criminalizes hijacking and attacks on aviation personnel.

title: The General Clauses Act, 1897
description: Provides general definitions, rules, and procedures applicable to all Central Acts for interpretation and administration.

title: The Suppression of Unlawful Acts Against Safety of Maritime Navigation and Fixed Platforms on Continental Shelf Act, 2002
description: Criminalizes acts threatening safety of ships, ports, and offshore platforms; ensures maritime security.

title: The Tokyo Convention Act, 1975
description: Implements the Tokyo Convention, governing offenses and unlawful acts on aircraft registered in India.

title: The Inland Waterways Authority of India Act, 1985
description: Establishes authority to manage and maintain inland waterways and promote navigation infrastructure in India.

title: The Rampur Raza Library  Act, 1975
description: Provides legal framework for administration and management of Rampur Raza Library and its heritage collections.

title: The Khuda Bakhsh Oriental Public Library Act, 1969
description: Governs preservation, administration, and public access to Khuda Bakhsh Oriental Library collections.

title: The Major Port Authorities Act, 2021
description: Regulates administration, management, and development of major ports; modernizes port governance.

title: The Anti-Apartheid (United Nations Convention) Act, 1981
description: Implements UN convention prohibiting apartheid; criminalizes acts supporting racial segregation abroad.

title: The Durgah khawaja Saheb Act, 1955
description: Provides legal framework for administration, management, and upkeep of the Durgah Khawaja Saheb shrine.

title: The National Commission for Homoeopathy Act, 2020.
description: Establishes the National Commission to regulate homoeopathy education and practice in India.

title: The Export-Import Bank of India Act, 1981
description: Establishes EXIM Bank to finance and facilitate foreign trade and export-import activities.

title: The Air (Prevention and Control of Pollution) Act, 1981
description: Provides measures to prevent and control air pollution and maintain air quality standards.

title: The Energy Conservation Act, 2001
description: Promotes energy efficiency and conservation across industries, buildings, and appliances.

title: The National Institutes of Food Technology, Entrepreneurship and Management Act, 2021.
description: Establishes NIFTEM Institutes to promote food technology, entrepreneurship, and management education.

title: The Regional Rural Banks Act, 1976
description: Provides for the establishment, regulation, and supervision of regional rural banks to support rural credit.

title: The Carriage by Road Act, 2007
description: Regulates contracts for carriage of goods and passengers by road in India.

title: The All-India Institute of Medical Science Act, 1956
description: Establishes AIIMS institutes to provide high-quality medical education, research, and healthcare.

title: The Press Council Act, 1978
description: Constitutes the Press Council to preserve the freedom of the press and maintain standards of journalism.

title: The Anti-Hijacking Act, 2016.
description: Provides measures to prevent, punish, and handle aircraft hijacking incidents.

title: The Apprentices Act, 1961
description: Regulates training and employment of apprentices in trades and industries across India.

title: The National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development Act, 2021
description: Establishes a bank to finance infrastructure projects and support sustainable development.

title: The Central Provinces Court of Wards Act, 1899
description: Provides for management and protection of estates of minors or incapacitated persons.

title: The Pondicherry (Extension of Laws) Act, 1968
description: Extends certain central laws to the Union Territory of Pondicherry.

title: The Official Languages Act, 1963
description: Defines use of Hindi and English in official communication of the central government.

title: The Election Laws (Extension to Sikkim) Act, 1976
description: Extends provisions of certain central election laws to the state of Sikkim.

title: The Tribunals Reforms Act, 2021
description: Reforms tribunal structure for faster and efficient resolution of disputes.

title: The Sports Broadcasting Signals (Mandatory Sharing with PrasarBharati) Act, 2007
description: Mandates sharing of sports broadcast signals with PrasarBharati for public telecast.

title: The Metro Railways (Operation and Maintenance) Act, 2002
description: Regulates operation, safety, and management of metro railway systems in India.

title: The Sales Promotion Employees (Conditions of Service) Act, 1976
description: Regulates working conditions and employment terms of sales promotion employees.

title: The Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology Act, 2007
description: Establishes RGIPT to provide education and research in petroleum and energy sector.

title: The Illegal Migrants (Determination by Tribunals) Act, 1983
description: Provides procedure for identifying and dealing with illegal migrants via tribunals.

title: The Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act, 1967
description: Prevents unlawful activities and associations that threaten the sovereignty and integrity of India.

title: The Bureau of Indian Standards Act, 2016
description: Establishes BIS to standardize products, services, and quality certifications in India.

title: The Commissions of Inquiry Act, 1952
description: Provides legal framework to constitute commissions for investigation of matters of public importance.

title: The Inland Vessels Act, 2021
description: Regulates navigation, safety, and registration of vessels in inland waterways.

title: The African Development Fund Act, 1982
description: Authorizes India’s contributions to the African Development Fund for international development projects.

title: The Smugglers and Foreign Exchange Manipulators (Forfeiture of Property) Act, 1976
description: Provides for forfeiture of property involved in smuggling or illegal foreign exchange dealings.

title: The Public Sector Iron and Steel Companies (Restructuring) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1978
description: Restructures and manages public sector iron and steel companies in India.

title: The National Institutes of Technology, Science Education and Research Act, 2007
description: Establishes NITs and Institutes of Science Education and Research to promote higher technical education.

title: The National Institutes of Design Act, 2014
description: Establishes National Institutes of Design to promote excellence in design education and research in India.

title: The African Development Bank Act, 1983
description: Regulates India’s participation and contributions to the African Development Bank for development projects.

title: The Indian Institutes of Information Technology (Public-private Partnership) Act, 2017
description: Establishes IIITs under a public-private partnership model to promote high-quality IT education.

title: The National Nursing and Midwifery Commission Act, 2023
description: Sets up a commission to regulate and promote nursing and midwifery education and practice in India.

title: The Revenue Recovery Act, 1890
description: Provides legal procedures for the recovery of public revenues due to the government.

title: The Limited Liability Partnership Act, 2008
description: Governs formation, operation, and regulation of limited liability partnerships in India.

title: The Regional Centre for Biotechnology Act, 2016
description: Establishes a Regional Centre for Biotechnology to promote advanced research, education, and training in biotechnology.

title: The North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971
description: Provides for the reorganisation of states in the North-Eastern region of India, including creation of new states and administrative structures.

title: The Metro Railways (Construction of Works) Act, 1978
description: Regulates construction, operation, and maintenance of metro railway projects in India.

title: The Armed Forces (Punjab and Chandigarh) Special Powers Act, 1983
description: Gives special powers to the armed forces to maintain law and order in disturbed areas of Punjab and Chandigarh.

title: The National Forensic Sciences University Act, 2020
description: Establishes the National Forensic Sciences University to advance education and research in forensic sciences.

title: The National Dental Commission Act, 2023
description: Sets up the National Dental Commission to regulate dental education, professionals, and standards in India.

title: The Agriculturists' Loans Act, 1884
description: Provides legal framework for recovery of loans advanced to agriculturists by banks or moneylenders.

title: The Indian Institute of Management Act, 2017
description: Declares IIMs as institutions of national importance and defines their governance, powers, and administration.

title: The Coast Guard Act, 1978
description: Establishes the Indian Coast Guard and defines its functions, duties, and powers for maritime safety and security.

title: The Central Universities Act, 2009
description: Provides for the establishment and governance of central universities across India.

title: The Competition Act, 2002
description: Promotes fair competition in the market, prohibits anti-competitive practices, and regulates mergers and acquisitions.

title: The Jammu and Kashmir (Extension of Laws) Act, 1956
description: Extends the applicability of certain central laws to the state of Jammu and Kashmir.

title: The Prevention of Money-Laundering Act, 2002
description: Provides for prevention, investigation, and prosecution of money-laundering activities and related offenses.

title: The Indian Forest Act, 1927
description: Provides for the conservation and management of forests, forest produce, and wildlife in India.

title: The Chartered Accountants Act, 1949
description: Regulates the profession of Chartered Accountants in India, including their certification and conduct.

title: The Maritime Anti-Piracy Act, 2022
description: Provides measures to prevent and combat piracy against Indian vessels and maritime interests.

title: The Patents Act, 1970
description: Governs the grant, protection, and enforcement of patents in India to encourage innovation and inventions.

title: The Sashastra Seema Bal Act, 2007
description: Establishes the Sashastra Seema Bal to secure the borders of India and maintain internal security.

title: The Indian Veterinary Council Act, 1984
description: Regulates veterinary education, registration, and the practice of veterinary medicine in India.

title: The Institutes of Technology Act, 1961
description: Declares IITs as institutions of national importance and defines their governance, powers, and administration.

title: The International Development Association (Status, Immunities and Privileges) Act, 1960
description: Grants privileges, immunities, and legal status to the International Development Association in India.

title: The Industrial Development Bank (Transfer of Undertaking and Repeal) Act, 2003
description: Provides for the transfer of the undertaking of IDBI and repeal of previous provisions.

title: The Calcutta Metro Railway (Operation and Maintenance) Temporary Provisions Act, 1985
description: Provides temporary provisions for the operation and maintenance of the Calcutta Metro Railway.

title: The Prevention of Cruelty to Animals Act, 1960
description: Prevents the infliction of unnecessary pain or suffering on animals and regulates their treatment.

title: The National Highways Act, 1956
description: Provides for the declaration, construction, and maintenance of national highways in India.

title: The Geneva Conventions Act, 1960
description: Enables the implementation of Geneva Conventions relating to the treatment of war victims and prisoners.

title: The Delhi Motor Vehicles Taxation Act, 1962
description: Regulates the levy and collection of motor vehicle taxes in Delhi.

title: The Births, Deaths and Marriages Registration Act, 1886
description: Provides a legal framework for registering births, deaths, and marriages in India.

title: The Central Sales Tax Act, 1956
description: Governs the levy of sales tax on inter-state transactions of goods in India.

title: The National Security Guard Act, 1986
description: Establishes the National Security Guard for counter-terrorism and national security operations.

title: The Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act, 2016
description: Regulates real estate transactions, promotes transparency, and protects homebuyers' interests.

title: The Cost Accountants Act, 1959
description: Regulates the profession of Cost Accountants in India and sets standards for cost auditing.

title: The English and Foreign Languages University Act, 2006
description: Establishes the English and Foreign Languages University and defines its governance and functions.

title: The Dr. Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University Act, 2016
description: Establishes the university to promote education and research in agricultural sciences.

title: The Maintenance and Welfare of Parents and Senior Citizens Act, 2007
description: Provides for maintenance, protection, and welfare of senior citizens and parents in India.

title: The Companies Act, 2013
description: Governs incorporation, regulation, and management of companies in India, including compliance and corporate governance.

title: The Child and Adolescent Labour (Prohibition and Regulation) Act, 1986
description: Prohibits employment of children in certain occupations and regulates working conditions for adolescents.

title: The Central Provinces Land-Revenue Act, 1881
description: Deals with collection and management of land revenue in the Central Provinces region.

title: The Prisons Act, 1894
description: Regulates the administration, discipline, and management of prisons in India.

title: The Advocates Act, 1961
description: Regulates the legal profession in India, including enrollment and conduct of advocates.

title: The Oudh Laws Act, 1876
description: Consolidates and reforms laws specific to the Oudh region during British India.

title: The Maternity Benefit Act, 1961
description: Provides maternity leave and benefits to women employees to protect their health and employment rights.

title: The Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013
description: Prevents sexual harassment of women at workplaces and provides a mechanism for redressal of complaints.

title: The Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019
description: Provides for the reorganisation of the state of Jammu and Kashmir into Union Territories and related governance provisions.

title: The Central Provinces Tenancy Act, 1898
description: Regulates tenancy rights, rents, and land disputes in the Central Provinces.

title: The Transplantation of Human Organs and Tissues Act, 1994
description: Regulates removal, storage, and transplantation of human organs and tissues to prevent commercial dealings.

title: The Delhi Municipal Corporation Act, 1957
description: Provides for the governance, administration, and functions of municipal corporations in Delhi.

title: The Delhi Police Act, 1978
description: Defines the organization, powers, and duties of the Delhi Police.

title: The Bombay Revenue Jurisdiction Act, 1876
description: Defines the revenue and civil jurisdiction of courts in the Bombay Presidency.

title: The Indira Gandhi National Tribal University Act, 2007
description: Establishes the university to promote higher education and research for tribal communities.

title: The Delhi and Ajmer-Merwara Land Development Act, 1948
description: Regulates land development and planning in Delhi and Ajmer-Merwara regions.

title: The Rajiv Gandhi University Act, 2006
description: Establishes Rajiv Gandhi University and sets its governance, academic, and administrative structures.

title: The Tripura University Act, 2006
description: Provides for the establishment and functioning of Tripura University.

title: The Prize Chits and Money Circulation Schemes (Banning) Act, 1978
description: Prohibits prize chits and money circulation schemes to protect the public from fraudulent financial activities.

title: The Delhi Land Holdings (Ceiling) Act, 1960
description: Imposes limits on land holdings in Delhi to ensure equitable distribution.

title: The Delhi Sales Tax Act, 1975
description: Regulates the levy and collection of sales tax on goods in Delhi.

title: The Visva-Bharati Act, 1951
description: Establishes Visva-Bharati University and governs its administration and academic framework.

title: The National Waterways Act, 2016
description: Declares and regulates national waterways for navigation and transport across India.

title: The Income-tax Act, 1961
description: Governs the taxation of income for individuals, companies, and entities in India.

title: The Bengal, Agra and Assam Civil Courts Act, 1887
description: Defines the jurisdiction and procedures of civil courts in Bengal, Agra, and Assam regions.

title: The Manipur (Sales of Motor Spirit and Lubricants) Taxation Act, 1962
description: Regulates taxation on sale of motor fuel and lubricants in Manipur.

title: The Delhi Rent Control Act, 1958
description: Controls rent, tenancy terms, and landlord-tenant relations in Delhi.

title: The Indian Tramways Act, 1886
description: Regulates the construction, operation, and management of tramways in India.

title: The Pondicherry University Act, 1985
description: Establishes Pondicherry University and defines its governance and functions.

title: The Sikkim University Act, 2006
description: Establishes Sikkim University and governs its administrative and academic structure.

title: The Indira Gandhi National Open University Act, 1985
description: Establishes IGNOU and regulates its operations, courses, and distance learning programs.

title: The Gift-tax Act, 1958
description: Provides rules for taxation on gifts received by individuals or entities.

title: The Manipur (Village Authorities in Hill Areas) Act, 1956
description: Defines the powers and functions of village authorities in the hill areas of Manipur.

title: The Chemical Weapons Convention Act, 2000
description: Implements the Chemical Weapons Convention and regulates handling of chemical weapons in India.

title: The Provincial Small Cause Courts Act, 1887
description: Regulates jurisdiction, procedures, and powers of provincial small cause courts in India.

title: The Wealth-tax Act, 1957
description: Imposes tax on the net wealth of individuals and entities in India.

title: The Manipur Land Revenue and Land Reforms Act, 1960
description: Deals with land revenue, tenancy, and land reforms in Manipur.

title: The Tripura Land Revenue and Land Reforms Act, 1960
description: Regulates land revenue collection, tenancy, and land reforms in Tripura.

title: The Customs Tariff Act, 1975
description: Provides the structure for customs duties on imports and exports in India.
